title: wine_Black_Coyote_2007_Reserve_Cabernet_Sauvignon_(Atlas_Peak)

Unnamed: 0: 81901.
country: US.
description: Tasted blind in a large group of Napa Valley Cabernets, this one stood out for sheer power and authority. It's absolutely delicious, dazzling showing blackberry tart, cherry pie with the sweet, smoky crust, cassis and baking spice flavors, wrapped into wonderfully thick, fine tannins. Pure California fruit, but dry, balanced and nuanced. A classic, but high-alcohol haters will find plenty to complain about. Drink nowâ€“2020..
designation: Reserve.
